display.title: Acquire: modern_industrialization:steam_mining_drill
description: You may want to consider making a Steam Mining Drill to obtain the ores directly without needing a Silk Touch pickaxe.
The Steam Mining Drill can mine 3x3 blocks at the time, perfect for your early game mining needs!
It also has Silk Touch which combines well with the Forge Hammer.
The Steam Mining Drill requires both water and solid fuel (for example coal).
Right-click a water source to fill it with water, and make sure to always place some fuel in your drill by right-clicking the fuel items on it in your inventory.
The fuel will be consumed slowly when you mine.
